testcase.name: Update My Appointments by doctor
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed When user clicks on login dropdown icon.....................................passed And user clicks on sign in dropdown.........................................passed And user sends username "<username>"........................................passed And user sends password "<password>"........................................passed Then user clicks on the sign in dropdown....................................passed Then user verifies the login is successful..................................passed And user clicks on login dropdown icon......................................passed And Doctor navigates to My Pages Dropdown...................................passed And Doctor clicks on My Appointments Button.................................passed And Doctor selects Appointment date from and to boxes.......................passed And Doctor clicks on Edit Button............................................passed Given Doctor verifies patient's info id, start and end date, status, physician are visible.passed And Doctor should fills in required fields, anemnesis, treatment, diagnosis which as required fields.passed And Doctor should fills in optional fields precription and description Which as optional fields.passed And Doctor can be select as PENDING, COMPLETED or CANCELLED at Status Dropdown.passed And Doctor ckicks on Save Button............................................passed And Doctor verifies Appointment is updated succesfully......................passed Then Doctor clicks Sign Out Button..........................................passed
